name: Fractured Mind
description:
Fractured Mind was developed by a small game jam group featuring members from different parts of the world. This is just our second time working together on a jam, and we put this together in less than two weeks.

OVERVIEW

It was a typical day in the Spring of the 1960's. Charlotte, the main protagonist, was about to begin preparing dinner until she noticed her son, William, has gone missing. 

Help Charlotte find William.

GAMEPLAY

- View lore

- Collect items

- Solve puzzles

- Evade the darkness

EXPERIENCE

Fractured Mind features very immersive audio along with various camera and lighting effects. For those who struggle with camera shaking and flashing lights, please disable these in the visual settings menu. 

By not adjusting these settings you are consenting to these effects occurring and hereby assume responsibility for any harm that may be caused as a result.
